file_content.text: So what do you say? Do we have a deal?
It is good bargain. Czerka give us weapons and speeders. We give you data.
Marvelous! I have absolutely no idea what you just said, my indelicate friend, but marvelous!
Sir! Intruders!
Well! You don't look like you're part of Shurg's little Gamorrean clan.
Are you with Czerka Corporation?
I assume you're corporate?
Oh, indeed.
Everyone, lower your weapons. I'm not here to fight.
Let's all stay calm.
Shurg's little clan is in a bunch of little pieces.
They're mostly dead.
You insult Shurg's clan! You will be cut apart!
That seems to have upset him--but I could be mistaken.
So, let me guess--you're here because of Kamus, hm? That little rat does know how to squeak.
Of course, I can't have you interrupting my deal. I'd murder you myself, but that's just not possible right now.
Who are you? What are you?
Huh?
Well! That's a bit personal. Maybe another time.
We can work this out.
I'm sure we could avoid a fight, but, hmm--let's not.
The rest of you can deal with this interruption. I'll be in touch later.
Scrawny thing going to die!
I'll just take what I need.
Fine with me. [Attack]
Shurg? Do let me know when this is over.
Blast--weapons out, everyone!
